title: Emani maaTaaDithivO
sahitya:
Emani mATADitivO rAma evari manasu EvidhamO telisi



anupallavi



mAma maradu lanujulu talitaNDrulu bhAmalu pari janulu sva

vashamauta



caraNam



rAjulu munulu surAsurulu vara digrAjulu mari shUrulu

shashadhara dina- 

    rAjulu lObadi naDavanu tyAgarAjavinuta naya bhayamuga mudduga
